short_summary: Training services related to private equity and limited partnership investing. A department within Global Affairs Canada is seeking an individual or organization that can provide training on private equity. The successful provider will have prior experience in private equity, and they must be able to establish training programs for departmental employees. The provider must also establish a digital platform for training, containing private equity curriculum and industry trends. This training will cover in-depth material on Private Equity terms, private equity process, roles, and characteristics, Benchmarks for contract and negotiation. It also mentions that the contract will be evaluated based on the RE Qualifying Statement assessment method. The price ceiling will be set at $ 60,000 worldwide, and the contractor's value-added tax (VAT) will not be borne by the contracting agency. The service provider will also be required to conduct an online digital course that covers the financial and economic aspects of private businesses. This training program is anticipated to finish in six months.

**Government Tender Announcement**
### Training Services for Private Equity and Limited Partnership Investing

**Reference Number:** cb-52-85831006
**Publication Date:** November 20, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2024, 14:00:00

**Overview**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires in-depth training services related to private equity and limited partnership investing. The training will enable the innovative and climate finance teams to understand their role as a limited partner and how limited partnership structures can enable the department to work more effectively with the private sector.

**Scope of Work**
The contractor must provide two online introductory courses on private equity fundamentals and economics, as well as a comprehensive two-day workshop on private equity for limited partners. The work will also involve providing necessary material and ongoing access to research and industry trends through an online platform.

**Deliverables**
The contractor must deliver the following:

* Online asynchronous introductory courses on private equity fundamentals and economics
* Comprehensive two-day workshop on private equity for limited partners
* Necessary material and ongoing access to research and industry trends through an online platform

**Criteria for Assessment of Statement of Capabilities**
Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that its service meets all the requirements, including:

* A minimum of 15 years' experience with private equity practitioners that are active in the industry
* A minimum of 15 years' experience working within complex, limited partnership structures
* In-depth knowledge and expertise of structuring limited partnership transactions in multiple jurisdictions
* Ability to provide training on Know Your Client regulatory requirements and legal documentation required for private equity transactions

**Trade Agreement**
This procurement is not subject to any trade agreements.

**Pre-Identified Supplier**
Global Affairs Canada intends to enter into a sole source contract with Institutional Limited Partners Association (ILPA) for in-depth training services related to private equity and limited partnership investing.

**Tender Description**
For a complete tender description, please visit [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52325/25-269756---acan---training-services-for-private-equity-and-limited-partnership-investing---gac_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52325/25-269756---acan---training-services-for-private-equity-and-limited-partnership-investing---gac_1
